member.name: M:UniversalRateReminder.FeedbackPopup.ShowFeedbackDialogAsync
member.summary: Increments the launch counter and if it is equal or greater than the current value of , shows the rating pop up. A flag will be set so the dialog only shows once.

member.name: T:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup
member.summary: A static class for showing a pop up for rating the app after the app has been launched a specific number of times.

member.name: F:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.UniversalRateReminderContainerName
member.summary: Name of the container for holding the settings.

member.name: F:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.CountPropertyName
member.summary: Launch count setting property name.

member.name: F:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.DismissedPropertyName
member.summary: Dismissed setting property name.

member.name: F:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.reminderContainer
member.summary: Container for saving the settings.

member.name: F:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.DefaultLaunchLimitForReminder
member.summary: The default number of times the application needs to be launched before showing the reminder. The default value is 5.

member.name: F:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.AppVersionPropertyName
member.summary: App version property name

member.name: P:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.Title
member.summary: The title for the rate pop up. The default value is "Rate us!".

member.name: P:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.Content
member.summary: The text content for the rate pop up. The default value is "Your feedback helps you improve this app. If you like it, please take a minute and rate it with five stars so we can continue working on new features and updates.".

member.name: P:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.RateButtonText
member.summary: The text for the rate button. The default value is "rate 5 stars".

member.name: P:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.CancelButtonText
member.summary: The text for the cancel button. The default value is "no, thanks".

member.name: P:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.LaunchLimit
member.summary: The number of times the applications needs to be launched before showing the reminder. The default value is .

member.name: P:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.ResetCountOnNewVersion
member.summary: Allows developer to reset the launch count when a new version is released

member.name: M:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.#cctor
member.summary: Static constructor for initializing default values.

member.name: M:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.CheckRateReminderAsync
member.summary: Increments the launch counter and if it is equal or greater than the current value of , shows the rating pop up. A flag will be set so the dialog only shows once.

member.name: M:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.ResetLaunchCount
member.summary: Resets the stored launch count to zero, and resets the flag that prevents the pop up from showing more than once.

member.name: M:UniversalRateReminder.RatePopup.GetAppVersion
member.summary: Get's the application version
